meanings.definition: A person who breaks into houses to steal.
meanings.sent1: The housebreakers were caught by the police red-handed.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was on high alert due to the presence of housebreakers.
meanings.sent3: The housebreakers tried to sneak in through the back door but got stuck in the doggy door!
meanings.sent4: The housebreakers were like shadows in the night, slipping in and out unnoticed.
meanings.sent5: The housebreakers left behind a trail of broken windows and stolen valuables.
